title: Create Interview with Job Description
steps: Visit the interview creation page
Enter a job description in the input field
Click the 'Save' button
Verify the skill recommendations are displayed
expected_result: The skill recommendations are displayed based on the job description

title: Create Interview with Enhanced JD Feature
steps: Visit the interview creation page
Enter a job title (e.g. '2-year experienced JavaScript developer with AWS experience')
Click the 'Use Enhanced JD' button
Verify a complete job description is generated by the AI
Edit and save the job description
expected_result: A complete job description is generated by the AI and can be edited and saved

title: Select AI Avatar (Advanced Plan)
steps: Visit the interview creation page (with an advanced plan user)
Enter a job description or use the enhanced JD feature
Click the 'Select AI Avatar' button
Verify the lip syncing aligns with the script
expected_result: The lip syncing aligns with the script

title: Customize Interview Questions
steps: Visit the interview creation page
Enter a job description or use the enhanced JD feature
Verify the suggested questions are displayed
Customize the questions by adding or deleting them
Verify the difficulty level of the questions can be set
expected_result: The questions can be customized and the difficulty level can be set

title: Create Interview with Standard and Role-Based Questions
steps: Visit the interview creation page
Enter a job description or use the enhanced JD feature
Verify the standard and role-based questions are displayed
Customize the questions by adding or deleting them
Verify the ideal answers can be set for each question
expected_result: The standard and role-based questions are displayed and can be customized

title: Create Interview with Unique Public Interview Link
steps: Visit the interview creation page
Enter a job description or use the enhanced JD feature
Customize the questions
Click the 'Create' button
Verify the unique public interview link is generated
expected_result: The unique public interview link is generated and can be used as an application form link

title: Test Candidate Responses
steps: Navigate to the responses tab
Verify the candidate's structured answers and video recordings are displayed
Verify the candidate's scores and resume are displayed
expected_result: The candidate's responses, scores, and resume are displayed correctly.

title: Test Interview Screening
steps: Navigate to the interview screenings section
Verify the AI analyzed scores are displayed
Verify the comprehensive summary of the interview is displayed, including observations, positives, and negatives
expected_result: The interview screenings section displays the AI analyzed scores and comprehensive summary correctly.

title: Test Action Button Functionality
steps: Click the select button on a candidate's profile
Verify the candidate's status is updated to 'selected'
Click the reject button on a candidate's profile
Verify the candidate's status is updated to 'rejected'
expected_result: The action button functionality updates the candidate's status correctly.

title: Test Ré Screening
steps: Create an interview and upload a set of résumés
Verify the AI commences the screening process
Verify the ré score is assigned based on the candidate's skills and experience
expected_result: The ré screening process assigns a ré score correctly based on the candidate's skills and experience.

title: Test AI Recommendations
steps: Verify the AI recommends candidates based on their suitability for the job
Verify the recommendation considers the candidate's skills, experience, and alignment with the job requirements
expected_result: The AI recommendations correctly identify suitable candidates for the job.

title: Test Interview Link Functionality
steps: Send an interview link to a candidate
Verify the interview link is valid for 24 hours
Verify the candidate can submit their interview at their convenience
expected_result: The interview link functionality allows candidates to submit their interview correctly.

title: Test Interview Screening Process
steps: Initiate the interview screening process for a candidate
Verify the comprehensive summary of the interview is displayed
Verify the AI analyzed scores are displayed
expected_result: The interview screening process displays the comprehensive summary and AI analyzed scores correctly.
